name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:rRNA (guanine-N2-)-methyltransferase
definition: S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + rRNA <=> S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + rRNA containing N2-methylguanine
comment: general reaction The enzyme ec 2.1.1.171 specifically methylates guanine966 at N2 in 16S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.172 specifically methylates guanine1207 at N2 in 16S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.173 specifically methylates guanine2445 at N2 in 23S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.174 specifically methylates guanine1835 at N2 in 23S rRNA.
